description:
Akane is the flakiest member of the Magic User’s Club, but also the most talented. Unfortunately, she usually uses her magic for pranks. When she uses magic in public and the aliens find out, she ends up their number one target!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Taketonbo to, Akane-chan to, Ikenai Mahou
The Whirligig, Akane, and Forbidden Magic
タケトンボと, 茜ちゃんと, いけない魔法
